thread.title: Dolphins wide receiver Tyreek Hill involved in domestic dispute with his wife | Marca
thread.title_full: Dolphins wide receiver Tyreek Hill involved in domestic dispute with his wife | Marca

author: Gustavo Rivadeneyra
title: Dolphins wide receiver Tyreek Hill involved in domestic dispute with his wife | Marca
text:
A t his condominium in Sunny Isles Beach on Monday, according to @local10news, Tyreek Hill, star of the Miami Dolphins, was reportedly involved in a domestic dispute with his wife .
After receiving a report of an "ongoing assault," officers from the Sunny Isles Beach Police Department responded shortly before 2 p.m. to the 18000 block of Collins Avenue.
Tyreek Hill breaks silence: 'They had no right to beat me up' Upon arriving at the scene, police reported that they spoke with Hill, his wife Keeta Hill, and her mother, Alesia Vaccaro . The mother stated that Hill is "very aggressive and impulsive" and that she feared for her daughter's safety.
Authorities said Vaccaro called the police after claiming she saw Tyreek Hill throw a computer to the ground, then pick up his daughter and begin arguing with his wife.
Ver esta publicación en Instagram Keeta Hill told police that she and Tyreek Hill had been arguing more frequently and stated that "he gets angry and throws things," according to the report.
The complaints reportedly state that Keeta confronted Tyreek about not being involved in raising their daughter. Police also noted, "Keeta is in the process of filing for divorce."
Ver esta publicación en Instagram Although Tyreek and his wife said the fight did not become physical, police observed that Keeta had a bruise on her upper chest.
She said he may have caused it unintentionally when he took the baby from her. According to officers, the child appeared to be fine and showed no signs of health issues.
For the time being, Keeta Hill declined to provide a written statement to police.
